about_the_game:
Path of Demise

Chapter 2 continues the story of Everlife where chapter 1 left off. Chapter 2 introduces many new gameplay mechanics alongside a greater insight into how the realm operates...

Girls and glitches

Survive the murderous tsundere girls in Atrociki High School and the mysterious Glitchese in a corrupted arcade. The Tsunderes have special abilities to make each of them unique, and the Glitchese move faster the further away they are from you. Let your guard down, and you'll be dead once more...

Beware of traps

Chapter 2 introduces traps, which will kill you if you come into contact with an active one. If one is blocking your path, you'll either have to disarm it, or detour around it. Some traps have similar core functions, but the challenge they provide will be slightly different each time. Watch your step!

Detect and recharge

Chapter 2 introduces two new abilities! Use the detector to see enemies' locations through walls, and use the recharger to recharge your other abilities quicker! Swap between them and use them strategically to gain the upper hand!

Have you played chapter 1?

I highly recommend playing the first chapter before making a decision about this DLC. Chapter 1 is meant to serve as Everlife's demo, and it's a great way to determine if you will enjoy the rest of the game!
